Comments :
Decorated Iraq war hero Sgt. Brandon King makes a celebrated return to 
his small Texas hometown following his tour of duty. He tries to resume 
the life he left behind. Then, against Brandon&#039;s will, the Army orders 
him back to duty in Iraq, which upends his world. The conflict tests 
everything he believes in: the bond of family, the loyalty of friendship, 
the limits of love and the value of honor.
